channel.title: CVE Feed for NHI -- card’s web service component
channel.description: The latest CVEs for NHI -- card’s web service component

item.title: CVE-2022-35218|2024-08-03T09:29:17.383Z -- nhi -- card%E2%80%99s%20web%20service%20component
item.description: The NHI card’s web service component has a heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability due to insufficient validation for packet origin parameter length. A LAN attacker with general user privilege can exploit this vulnerability to disrupt service.

item.title: CVE-2022-35217|2024-08-03T09:29:17.401Z -- nhi -- card%E2%80%99s%20web%20service%20component
item.description: The NHI card’s web service component has a stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability due to insufficient validation for network packet header length. A local area network attacker with general user privilege can exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code, manipulate system command or disrupt service.

item.title: CVE-2022-35219|2024-08-03T09:29:17.464Z -- nhi -- card%E2%80%99s%20web%20service%20component
item.description: The NHI card’s web service component has a stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability due to insufficient validation for network packet key parameter. A LAN attacker with general user privilege can exploit this vulnerability to disrupt service.
